    • Content

      * ITSP AppB.11 - AppB.12


sysuse lifeexp, clear
foreach v of varlist lexp gnppc safewater {
	summarize `v'
	correlate popgrowth `v' 
	scatter popgrowth `v'
}


use gdp4cty, clear
local ctycode 111 112 136 134
local i 0
foreach c of local ctycode {
	local ++i
	local rc "`rc' (`i'=`c')"
}
display "`rc'"
recode cc `rc', gen(newcc)
tabulate newcc
